title: Bad Girls - Series 2 - 13 Episodes+Bonus - DVDRip.avi - BadGirl2
description:
BAD GIRLS - SERIES 2 - UNCUT - (13 EPISODES) & DVD BONUS EXTRAS!

GENIUNE DVD RIP
FORMAT: AVI
LANGUAGE: ENGLISH
CODEC: DIVX

BAD GIRLS is the smash hit ITV drama series set behind the bars of a women's prison. Seperated from their homes, children and lovers, the women struggle to cope with the harsh reality of this hidden world. BAD GIRLS doesn't shy away from portraying the cruelties and tense relationships inside the prison system, but it also captures the warmth and humour needed to survive it.

EPISODE 1 - TUG OF LOVE
Zandra goes to desperate lengths to keep her baby. Helen returns to Larkhall, thwarting Jim's promotion prospects. Shell phones Jim's wife about what Jim's been up to....

EPISODE 2 - SHIT HAPPENS
Helen is torn between duty and desire. Jim discovers Shell's deceit and his anger knows no bounds....

EPISODE 3 - VISITING TIME
Julie J discovers her children are back in England, but Sylvia spoils the re-union party. Jim's ex-lover, Karen Betts, becomes Wing Governor and shows Jim how unsentimental she can be.

EPISODE 4 - LOOKING FOR LOVE
Denny gets a chance to visit her mum on the outside... and her dreams for their future are shattered. Jim clears his name and returns to G Wing, but from now on it's no Mr. Nice Guy....

EPISODE 5 - MISTAKEN IDENTITY
Mad Tessa, a nightmare from the past, returns to haunt Karen - and only Jim can save her life. New prisoner, Barbara Hunt goes through hell in a case of mistaken identity....

EPISODE 6 - LOSING IT
Shell reveals the true horror of her childhood. The Two Julies make it happen for Josh and Crystal. Karen punishes Sylvia with a harsh fitness regime.

EPISODE 7 - THE SET-UP
In the nick of time, Jim thwarts Yvonne's escape attempt. Helen returns in her new role as Lifer Governor - with an opportunity to re-open Nikki's case. Zandra's illness is finally - and tragically - diagnosed....

EPISODE 8 - BABES BEHIND BARS
Shell confronts her mother about her past abuse. Yvonne launches her new money-making scheme - Babes Behind Bars. Crystal risks losing Josh to stay in prison with Zandra....

EPISODE 9 - THE LEAVING
The women mourn the loss of a true friend, and Denny falls for the new arrival. Shell bites off more than she can chew when she takes on Barbara. Against her better judgement, Karen falls under Jim's spell....

EPISODE 10 - FAMILY PLAN
The Two Julies' madcap plan to have a baby goes yoghurt-pot up. Yvonne's deadly rival pitches up on G Wing.

EPISODE 11 - ROUGH JUSTICE
Everyone's a suspect when Renee bites the dust. Helen has some fantastic news for Nikki. Jim's wife frees him to pursue Karen.

EPISODE 12 - FACING UP
Shaz is forced to confront the consequences of her crime. Nikki's jealousy destroys her relationship with Helen. Shaz and Denny give Sylvia a taste of 'bang-up'.

EPISODE 13 - OH WHAT A NIGHT!
Nikki risks all for one night with Helen. Jim blows it with Karen and ends up at Shell's mercy. Sylvia has an 'ecstatic' anniversary party, thanks to a little illegal gift from the women on G Wing....

BONUS SPECIAL FEATURES INCLUDED
 - Commentary track (episode 13)
 - Gallery One: Behind The Scenes
 - Gallery Two: The National TV Awards
 - Bad Girls in South Africa:
       - Simone & Mandana's Trailers - Uncut
       - Documentary
 - Outtakes
 - Deleted Scenes
 - Cast Biographies
 - Producer Biographies


CAST: Victoria Alcock; Isabelle Amyes; Lara Cazalet; Sharon Duncan-Brewster; Jack Ellis; Alicya Eyo; Lindsey Fawcett; Helen Fraser; Linda Henry; Mandana Jones; Claire King; Simone Lahbib; Kika Mirylees; Alison Newman; Joe Shaw; Debra Stephenson & Tracey Wilkinson
